name: Discord 2000s Edition (MSN Messenger)
description:
This style replicates that of the early messenger known as MSN! Feeling nostalgic or want to visit a time before your own? Check out this theme then!
[b]MAKE SURE LIGHT MODE IS ON OR SOME PARTS WILL LOOK WEIRD[/b]
additional_info:
[b]HOW TO ADD THIS TO BETTERDISCORD[/b]
1. Download the theme
2. Click on the extension
3. Click on "Installed"
4. Click the pencil icon on the theme module
5. Copy and paste the css into BetterDiscord
Then you're done! :D

v1.0-11.20 First release.
